name: places/ChIJZwFsq61ZwokRg0qejvnmtsc
adrFormatAddress: 520 8th Ave, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: Patty is an incredible dance instructor! I had the pleasure of working with her for several sessions and I feel I have learned so much in that amount of time I was taking classes. Her classes and energy have re sparked my love of hip hop dancing. She was patient, and kind with where I was technically after all these years of not dancing. I can’t recommend classes with Patty enough!!

text.text: Patty is an incredible dance instructor! I had the pleasure of working with her for several sessions and I feel I have learned so much in that amount of time I was taking classes. Her classes and energy have re sparked my love of hip hop dancing. She was patient, and kind with where I was technically after all these years of not dancing. I can’t recommend classes with Patty enough!!

originalText.text: I had private lesson with Patty and it was an incredible experience. She’s a talented dancer and is equally effective at helping others to learn how to tap into their rhythm and have more fluid movements. She’s passionate, professional and flexible with her teaching methods. She not only taught me how to dance but also she helped build my confidence to learn how to dance in a way I’ve always wanted to. If you have a chance to take a lesson with Patty don’t miss this opportunity!

text.text: I had private lesson with Patty and it was an incredible experience. originalText.text: Patty's class was amazing! I attended a 6-week beginner class with Patty during March - April. She was very thorough and helpful. She would effectively balance attention between the group and address our individual needs. My biggest takeaway was that I learned to be more comfortable and play around with the moves we learned. I also had a strong understanding of the core movements. All in all, I loved it and would take her class again in a heartbeat!

text.text: Patty's class was amazing! I attended a 6-week beginner class with Patty during March - April. She was very thorough and helpful. I also had a strong understanding of the core movements. All in all, I loved it and would take her class again in a heartbeat!

originalText.text: Awesome dance class! Patty is a great dance teacher who really cares about her students. She encouraged us to email her any questions we had or certain songs we wanted to dance to. Patty teaches you how to become comfortable dancing on your own and finding your own rhythm to any beat. I’m excited to take the next class!

Patty teaches you how to become comfortable dancing on your own and finding your own rhythm to any beat. I’m excited to take the next class!

originalText.text:
I was a little reserve when I sign up for beginner’s hip hop with Patty. How relieve I was when she started the class, Patty is so sweet and patient. I actually can “MOVE” who new. I highly recommend Patty she is absolutely awesome a true professional. Definitely five star status!!

_ Alexis, student
